event.title: was elevated to the status of a city on November 18, 1988

data.event: The former borough was elevated to the status of a city on November 18, 1988.

event.title: was established by Spanish Governor Don José Maria Chacón in 1784

data.event: A town named San Fernando de Naparima was established by Spanish Governor Don José Maria Chacón in 1784, in honour of the heir to Spanish crown.
